name: Don't Go into the Light (BAOTD, Maxwell Engel, Ally Chen)
name_original: Don't Go into the Light (BAOTD, Maxwell Engel, Ally Chen)
description:
Summary

DGITL is a simple 3D Horror game of a little kid exploring a haunted house and discovering the dark secrets trapped inside it.   Use tools to interact with the light!  Stay ̴̀ä̸̘̦͙̖w̵̪̤̻͉̓́̿a̶̲̦̳̾̑y̸͇̖̓ ̸̰͚̓́f̵̨̼̭̋ȓ̸̨̜̇͘ǫ̸̧̡̥̍̄̑͝m̶͓̀̂ ̵̆ the light...  ̷͕̩͌̔̀̀Î̶̫͍t̶̹͍̤̃̕  is  ̷͕̩͌̔̀̀ṅ̶̡̟͚͂͘ọ̶͒̔t̷̘̗͙̥͒̀̊̕ … SAFE!!! 

Controls
  • WASD to move (Hold Shift to Sprint)
  • Space to Jump
  • Mouse to look around
Credits
  • Ally Chen - UI/UX Designer and Art
  • Henry Dang - Level Design and Production
  • Matt Eng - Programming and Writing
  • Maxwell Engel - Programming and Design
  • Alina Kim - Audio
